verses.verse: Again in the ninth <S%H8671><s%> year, <S%H8141><s%> in the tenth <S%H6224><s%> month, <S%H2320><s%> in the tenth <S%H6218><s%> day of the month, <S%H2320><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> to me, saying, <S%H559><s%>

Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> write <S%H3789><s%> you the name <S%H8034><s%> of the day, <S%H3117><s%> even of this <S%H2088><s%> same <S%H6106><s%> day: <S%H3117><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%> set <S%H5564><s%> himself against <S%H413><s%> Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> same <S%H6106><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>

And utter <S%H4911><s%> a parable <S%H4912><s%> to the rebellious <S%H4805><s%> house, <S%H1004><s%> and say <S%H559><s%> to them, Thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD; <S%H3069><s%> Set <S%H8239><s%> on a pot, <S%H5518><s%> set <S%H8239><s%> it on, and also <S%H1571><s%> pour <S%H3332><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> into it:

Gather <S%H622><s%> the pieces <S%H5409><s%> thereof into it, even every <S%H3605><s%> good <S%H2896><s%> piece, <S%H5409><s%> the thigh, <S%H3409><s%> and the shoulder; <S%H3802><s%> fill <S%H4390><s%> it with the choice <S%H4005><s%> bones. <S%H6106><s%>

Take <S%H3947><s%> the choice <S%H4005><s%> of the flock, <S%H6629><s%> and burn <S%H1754><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> the bones <S%H6106><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> it, and make it boil <S%H7570><s%> well, <S%H7571><s%> and let them seethe <S%H1310><s%> the bones <S%H6106><s%> of it therein. <S%H8432><s%>

Why <S%H3651><s%> thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD; <S%H3069><s%> Woe <S%H188><s%> to the bloody <S%H1818><s%> city, <S%H5892><s%> to the pot <S%H5518><s%> whose <S%H834><s%> scum <S%H2457><s%> is therein, and whose scum <S%H2457><s%> is not gone <S%H3318><s%> out of it! bring <S%H3318><s%> it out piece <S%H5409><s%> by piece; <S%H5409><s%> let no <S%H3808><s%> lot <S%H1486><s%> fall <S%H5307><s%> on it.

For her blood <S%H1818><s%> is in the middle <S%H8432><s%> of her; she set <S%H7760><s%> it on the top <S%H6706><s%> of a rock; <S%H5553><s%> she poured <S%H8210><s%> it not on the ground, <S%H776><s%> to cover <S%H3680><s%> it with dust; <S%H6083><s%>

That it might cause fury <S%H2534><s%> to come <S%H5927><s%> up to take vengeance; <S%H5359><s%> I have set <S%H5414><s%> her blood <S%H1818><s%> on the top <S%H6706><s%> of a rock, <S%H5553><s%> that it should not be covered. <S%H3680><s%>

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD; <S%H3069><s%> Woe <S%H188><s%> to the bloody <S%H1818><s%> city! <S%H5892><s%> I will even make the pile <S%H4071><s%> for fire great. <S%H1431><s%>

Heap <S%H7235><s%> on wood, <S%H6086><s%> kindle <S%H1814><s%> the fire, <S%H784><s%> consume <S%H8552><s%> the flesh, <S%H1320><s%> and spice <S%H7543><s%> it well, and let the bones <S%H6106><s%> be burned. <S%H2787><s%>

Then set <S%H5975><s%> it empty <S%H7385><s%> on the coals <S%H1513><s%> thereof, that the brass <S%H5178><s%> of it may be hot, <S%H3179><s%> and may burn, <S%H2787><s%> and that the filthiness <S%H2932><s%> of it may be molten <S%H5413><s%> in it, that the scum <S%H2457><s%> of it may be consumed. <S%H8552><s%>

She has wearied <S%H3811><s%> herself with lies, <S%H8383><s%> and her great <S%H7227><s%> scum <S%H2457><s%> went <S%H3318><s%> not forth <S%H3318><s%> out of her: her scum <S%H2457><s%> shall be in the fire. <S%H784><s%>

In your filthiness <S%H2932><s%> is lewdness: <S%H2154><s%> because <S%H3282><s%> I have purged <S%H2891><s%> you, and you were not purged, <S%H2891><s%> you shall not be purged <S%H2891><s%> from your filthiness <S%H2932><s%> any more, <S%H5750><s%> till <S%H5704><s%> I have caused my fury <S%H2534><s%> to rest <S%H5117><s%> on you.

I the LORD <S%H3068><s%> have spoken <S%H1696><s%> it: it shall come <S%H935><s%> to pass, and I will do <S%H6213><s%> it; I will not go <S%H6544><s%> back, <S%H6544><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> will I spare, <S%H2347><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> will I repent; <S%H5162><s%> according to your ways, <S%H1870><s%> and according to your doings, <S%H5949><s%> shall they judge <S%H8199><s%> you, said <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD. <S%H3069><s%>
Also the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> to me, saying, <S%H559><s%>

Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> behold, <S%H2005><s%> I take <S%H3947><s%> away from you the desire <S%H4261><s%> of your eyes <S%H5869><s%> with a stroke: <S%H4046><s%> yet neither <S%H3808><s%> shall you mourn <S%H5594><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> weep, <S%H1058><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> shall your tears <S%H1832><s%> run <S%H935><s%> down.

Forbear <S%H1826><s%> to cry, <S%H602><s%> make <S%H6213><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> mourning <S%H60><s%> for the dead, <S%H4191><s%> bind <S%H2280><s%> the tire <S%H6287><s%> of your head on you, and put <S%H7760><s%> on your shoes <S%H5275><s%> on your feet, <S%H7272><s%> and cover <S%H5844><s%> not your lips, <S%H8222><s%> and eat <S%H398><s%> not the bread <S%H3899><s%> of men. <S%H582><s%>

So I spoke <S%H1696><s%> to the people <S%H5971><s%> in the morning: <S%H1242><s%> and at even <S%H6153><s%> my wife <S%H802><s%> died; <S%H4191><s%> and I did <S%H6213><s%> in the morning <S%H1242><s%> as I was commanded. <S%H6680><s%>
And the people <S%H5971><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to me, Will you not tell <S%H5046><s%> us what <S%H4100><s%> these <S%H428><s%> things are to us, that you do <S%H6213><s%> so?
Then I answered <S%H559><s%> them, The word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> to me, saying, <S%H559><s%>

Speak <S%H559><s%> to the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> Thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD; <S%H3069><s%> Behold, <S%H2005><s%> I will profane <S%H2490><s%> my sanctuary, <S%H4720><s%> the excellency <S%H1347><s%> of your strength, <S%H5797><s%> the desire <S%H4261><s%> of your eyes, <S%H5869><s%> and that which your soul <S%H5315><s%> pities; <S%H4263><s%> and your sons <S%H1121><s%> and your daughters <S%H1323><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> you have left <S%H5800><s%> shall fall <S%H5307><s%> by the sword. <S%H2719><s%>
And you shall do <S%H6213><s%> as I have done: <S%H6213><s%> you shall not cover <S%H5844><s%> your lips, <S%H8222><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> eat <S%H398><s%> the bread <S%H3899><s%> of men. <S%H582><s%>

And your tires <S%H6287><s%> shall be on your heads, <S%H7218><s%> and your shoes <S%H5275><s%> on your feet: <S%H7272><s%> you shall not mourn <S%H5594><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> weep; <S%H1058><s%> but you shall pine <S%H4743><s%> away for your iniquities, <S%H5771><s%> and mourn <S%H5098><s%> one <S%H376><s%> toward <S%H413><s%> another. <S%H251><s%>

Thus Ezekiel <S%H3168><s%> is to you a sign: <S%H4159><s%> according to all <S%H3605><s%> that he has done <S%H6213><s%> shall you do: <S%H6213><s%> and when this comes, <S%H935><s%> you shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD. <S%H3069><s%>

Also, you son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> shall it not be in the day <S%H3117><s%> when I take <S%H3947><s%> from them their strength, <S%H4581><s%> the joy <S%H4885><s%> of their glory, <S%H8597><s%> the desire <S%H4261><s%> of their eyes, <S%H5869><s%> and that whereupon they set <S%H4853><s%> their minds, <S%H5315><s%> their sons <S%H1121><s%> and their daughters, <S%H1323><s%>
That he that escapes <S%H6412><s%> in that day <S%H3117><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%> to you, to cause you to hear <S%H2045><s%> it with your ears? <S%H241><s%>

In that day <S%H3117><s%> shall your mouth <S%H6310><s%> be opened <S%H6605><s%> to him which is escaped, <S%H6412><s%> and you shall speak, <S%H1696><s%> and be no <S%H3808><s%> more <S%H5750><s%> dumb: <S%H481><s%> and you shall be a sign <S%H4159><s%> to them; and they shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>
